item.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 launches August 1 in Japan, August 5 in the west
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/demon-slayer-kimetsu-no-yaiba-the-hinokami-chronicles-2-launches-august-1-in-japan-august-5-in-the-west

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Digital pre-orders open March 3.

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 1 in Japan and August 5 in the west, publishers Aniplex and SEGA, and developer CyberConnect2 announced. Pre-orders for the Digital Deluxe Edition include five days of early access to the game. Digital pre-orders will open on March 3 across all platforms except Switch, which will follow at a later date.

The game will be available in the following editions:

■ Game Editions

Digital pre-orders will kick off this Monday, March 3, 2025, for PlayStation, Xbox, and Steam platforms, with the Switch version to follow later.

Digital Deluxe Edition ($69.99 USD MSRP)

Those who order the Digital Deluxe Edition will unlock the following:

  • Base game
  • Two Kimetsu Academy Character Unlock Keys – Kyojuro Rengoku and Tengen Uzui
  • Four Character Unlock Keys – Tengen Uzui, Obanai Iguro, Sanemi Shinazugawa, and Gyomei Himejima
  • VS Mode System Voice: Upper Rank Demons Set – Akaza, Daki, Gyutaro, Gyokko, and Zohakuten
  • Three Battle Attire Costumes – Tanjiro Kamado’s Kimono (Entertainment District), Inosuke Hashibira’s Kimono (Entertainment District), and Tengen Uzui’s Shinobi Attire
  • Pre-order bonuses:
    • Advanced Access* – The ability to play the game starting on July 31, 2025
    • Two Character Unlock Keys** – Muichiro Tokito and Mitsuri Kanroji

Digital Standard Edition ($59.99 USD MSRP)

The Digital Standard Edition features the following:

  • Base game
  • Two Kimetsu Academy Character Unlock Keys – Kyojuro Rengoku and Tengen Uzui
  • Pre-order bonus: 2 Character Unlock Keys** – Muichiro Tokito and Mitsuri Kanroji

Physical Edition ($59.99 USD MSRP)

A physical edition for The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will also be available to pre-order. This version includes:

  • Base Game
  • Two Character Unlock Keys*** – Muichiro Tokito and Mitsuri Kanroji

*Must pre-order the Digital Deluxe Edition prior to August 5, 2025. Not available for Switch.
**Only available until the game launches on August 5, 2025
***Only available in the limited time launch version of the physical edition.

Bonuses for Linking Save Data

Finally, the following bonus items will be available for those with save data from either Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles or Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – Sweep the Board!.

  • Bonuses for The Hinokami Chronicles save data:
    • Six Kimetsu Academy Character Unlock Keys – Tanjiro Kamado, Nezuko Kamado, Zenitsu Agatsuma, Inosuke Hashibira, Shinobu Kocho, and Giyu Tomioka
  • Bonuses for Sweep the Board! save data:
    • One Character Unlock Key – Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma
      • All three serve as one playable character
    • Three Battle Attire Costumes – Hinatsuru (Meal Prep), Makio (Meal Prep), and Suma (Meal Prep)

Please note the respective save data must be linked through the same platform users purchase The Hinokami Chronicles 2.
